title: Use of System.out.println
description: Detect direct console printing instead of proper logging framework.

title: Unused Imports
description: Identify and remove unnecessary import statements.

title: Empty Catch Block
description: Catch block with no handling logic.

title: String Concatenation Inside Loop
description: Use StringBuilder instead of repeated string concatenation inside loops.

title: Magic Numbers
description: Numeric literals should be replaced with named constants.

title: Deprecated API Usage
description: Use of deprecated methods or classes should be avoided.

title: Field Injection Instead of Constructor Injection
description: Use constructor injection instead of field injection.

title: Hardcoded Configuration
description: Avoid hardcoding paths, URLs, and configuration values in code.

title: Unnecessary Object Creation
description: Avoid repeatedly creating objects inside loops.

title: Throwing Raw Exception
description: Use meaningful or custom exceptions instead of generic Exception.

title: Utility Class Should Not Have Public Constructor
Resources Should Be Closed
description: Use try-with-resources to ensure resources are closed automatically.

title: Optional Value Should Not Be Accessed Without Check
description: Replace isPresent() + get() pattern with ifPresent().

title: Assignments Should Not Be Made From Within Sub-Expressions
description: Split assignment from condition for clarity and safety.

title: Unused Local Variables Should Be Removed
description: Remove local variables that are declared but never used.

title: Dead Store Should Be Removed
description: Remove assignments to variables that are never subsequently used.

title: Redundant Casts Should Be Removed
description: Remove unnecessary type casts that do not affect behavior.

title: String Comparison Should Use equals()
description: Replace '==' with '.equals()' for string comparison.

title: Switch Statements Should Have a Default Case
description: Add a default case to switch statements.

title: Anonymous Classes Should Be Converted to Lambdas
description: Convert eligible anonymous classes to lambda expressions.

title: Lambdas Should Be Replaced With Method References
description: Use method references where possible.

title: Traditional For Loop Can Be Replaced With Enhanced For Loop
description: Convert index-based loops to enhanced for-each loops when possible.
